summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 1629, for the improvement of West 51st Street, in the City of Seattle, from 8th Avenue Northwest to 11th Avenue Northwest, by the construction of sewers therein of proper dimensions and materials, together with all necessary wyes, openings, manholes, flush tanks, catch basins, and their appurtenances, under Ordinance No. 17338 and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against each parcel of land and part thereof shown in said roll, and providing for the collection thereof.
